title: Loose Guardrail at Stair Core
description: Temporary guardrail at the stair core was found loose and unstable. Status: Resolved – guardrail was re-fixed with additional fasteners and inspected by safety officer.

title: Water Ingress Near Electrical Room
description: Water was observed seeping through slab near the electrical room entry. Status: Resolved – leak path sealed, area dried, and electrical panels checked for moisture.

title: Blocked Access Path
description: Material pallets were blocking the main circulation path for workers. Status: Resolved – pallets relocated to designated storage zone and path re-marked.

title: Unmarked Opening in Slab
description: Floor opening for future ductwork was left unbarricaded and unmarked. Status: Resolved – opening has been barricaded and warning signage installed.

title: Column Concreting Completed
description: All 3rd floor columns in grid B–D / 2–5 have been cast and initial curing has started. Status: Resolved – QA/QC checks completed and logged.

title: Unsecured Rebar Bundles
description: Rebar bundles stored near roof edge were not properly tied down. Status: Resolved – bundles secured with ties and moved 2m away from edge protection.

title: Missing Safety Signage at Gate
description: No PPE/speed limit signage was visible at the main site entrance gate. Status: Resolved – mandatory signage installed and photographed for records.

title: Inadequate Housekeeping Near Lift Core
description: Tools and off-cuts scattered around lift core area created minor trip hazards. Status: Resolved – area cleaned and housekeeping checklist updated.

title: Scaffolding Toe Boards Missing
description: Toe boards were missing on external scaffolding facing north elevation. Status: Resolved – toe boards installed along full length and re-inspected.

title: Solar Panel Mounts Aligned
description: All solar panel mounting rails have been fixed and aligned as per layout. Status: Resolved – alignment verified with site engineer and documented.

title: Improper Cylinder Storage
description: Gas cylinders were stored upright but without chains or racks. Status: Resolved – cylinders shifted to designated cage and secured with chains.
